title: Thanksgiving Buffet
description:
Eat, drink and be thankful this Thanksgiving at the Padre Hotel! Enjoy a festive holiday buffet with all the fixin's with your family on Thanskgiving day from 10am to 4pm.  $39/adults, $15/children 12 and under. Reservations are recommended - 661.427.4900
